data_table.description: Outcomes - Fracture (Form 123). Note: The rel# in the file name is used by the submitter to track embargo releases. Files that have "rel2" or later may either contain additional variables or more recent data as compared to the previous rel#. There will not be a "rel3" file.

variable.name: BKANKLE
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Ankle Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCARPAL
variable.comment: Carpal bones in wrist Carpal Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Carpal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCLAVICLE
variable.comment: Clavical Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Clavical Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKELBOWNOS
variable.comment: Elbow, not otherwise specified Elbow NOS Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Elbow NOS Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKHIP
variable.comment: Hip Fracture was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 hip fracture is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: BKLELBOW
variable.comment: Lower End of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Lower End of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKHAND
variable.comment: Metacarpal Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Metacarpal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKPATELLA
variable.comment: Patella Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Patella Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKPELVIS
variable.comment: Pelvis Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Pelvis Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKLARM
variable.comment: Radius or Ulna Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Radius or Ulna Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCOCCYX
variable.comment: Sacrum or Coccyx Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Sacrum or Coccyx Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKSCAPULA
variable.comment: Scapula Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Scapula Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUPPERLEG
variable.comment: Shaft of Femur Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Shaft of Femur Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKOHUMERUS
variable.comment: Fracture of humerus, shaft or unspecified part Shaft of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Shaft of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKFOOT
variable.comment: Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKTIBIAFIBULA
variable.comment: Tibia or Fibula Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Tibia or Fibula Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKTIBIAL
variable.comment: Tibial Plateau Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Tibial Plateau Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUHUMERUS
variable.comment: Upper End of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Upper End of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUELBOW
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKSPINE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Lumbar Spine Fracture or Thoracic Spine Fracture. Vertebral Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Does not include cervical fractures.

variable.name: HIPFBASE
variable.comment: Not collected on early versions of F123. Value 5 was not collected after WHI closeout.
variable.value: Radiology & discharge summary dx new hip fracture
Radiology dx of hip fx, but not on discharge summary
Discharge, equiv. xray, unequiv. scan/MRI dx hip fx
Hip fracture dx in discharge summary, but no radiology rprt
Uncertain radiology report of hip fracture without add. doc

variable.name: HIPFPATH
variable.comment: Pathologic hip fracture: (Fracture resulting from bone tumors or cysts, Paget's disease, bone or joint prostheses, or surgical manipulation.Osteoporotic fracture is not considered a pathologic fracture.)

variable.name: FRACSIDE
variable.comment: Not collected after WHI closeout.

variable.name: FRACCONF
variable.comment: Not collected after WHI closeout.
variable.value: Non vertebal: Radiology report new fracture
Non vertebal: Radiology report healing fracture
Non vertebal: Non radiology report new/healing fracture
Non vertebal: Init. rad.report equiv., subs report dx fract.
Vertebal: Radiology report based on AP/lateral thoracolumbar
Vertebal: Radiology rprt not based AP/lateral thoracolumbar

variable.name: FRACPATH
variable.comment: Pathologic fracture other than hip: (Fracture resulting from bone tumors or cysts, Paget's disease, bone and joint prostheses, or surgical manipulation. Osteoporotic fracture is not considered a pathologic fracture.) Not collected after WHI closeout. Non vertebral fractures are not counted if they are pathologic.
